description:
Live Show Mondays brings you the conclusion of the June live show that featured Lorelei Lee, Jade Indica and special guest co-top Sexy Jade.
We bind our girls in one of the most diabolical double binds to date. Jade Indica is on the floor, with her feet tied to a rope that is pulling on Lorelei sexy inverted neck. Jade must keep her feet up at all times or she will slowly choke out Lorelei who is helpless with a vibrator on her clit. Jade is brought to tears as she struggles not to choke her friend, and her legs and stomach muscles give out. Jade begs for help as her legs get heavier and heavier and she can longer keep her legs up. Lorelei suffers as her friend fails her. One of the most intense live scenes we have done to date.
title: Jade Indica, Lorelei Lee and Sexy Jade
